name: user css
description: user-customized CSS styles. 1. Create a page and make it public; 2. Add one or more code blocks (code blocks cannot be wrapped by callouts or folding blocks); 3. Write the CSS styles you need; 4. You can add a title to the code block, which makes it easier to find the corresponding code in the developer tools.

options.label: Your customized page's id
options.tooltip: First you need to add one or more code blocks to **a public page** and write CSS code in it. We will get the CSS code inside and inject it into Notion.
